import './PersonalInfo.css' import { useState } from 'react' function PersonalInfo({ state, Dispatch, handleTextInput}) { const [theName,setName]=useState("youssef") return (

Personal info

Please provide your name, email address, and phone number.

setName(e.target.value)} autoComplete='on' name='fullName' type='text' id='name' className='p-md-3 mb-md-2 mb-2 p-2' placeholder='e.g ds King' /> {theName}
) } export default PersonalInfo
